entry.title: [CW] News from an old corner of the culture war: Oberlin is [denied an appeal](https:
entry.content: News from an old corner of the culture war: Oberlin is [denied an appeal](https://legalinsurrection.com/2022/08/gibsons-bakery-wins-ohio-supreme-court-refuses-to-hear-oberlin-college-appeal/) to the Ohio Supreme Court in its loss to Gibson's Bakery. This is the end of the appellate road in the state, but I don't know if federal court is an option.
